     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Gender and Sexuality in Islam &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>

     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17580508">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17580508">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17580508">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17580508">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17580508" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17580509">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17580509">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17580509">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17580509">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the&nbsp;
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;
           </span>
           found next to the citation, or search on the article title in
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17580509" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17580510">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17580510">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17580510">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works that recommend scholarly articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17580510">
          <div id="boxatt17580510" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20670101">
              <a id="link_20670101" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oxfordreference.com/view/10.1093/acref/9780195305135.001.0001/acref-9780195305135" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20670101,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender and Sexuality in Islam', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20130511}); ">
               Oxford Encyclopedia of the Islamic World
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Academic press.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21767592">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21767592">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21767592">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly and doctrinal books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21767592">
          <div id="boxatt21767592" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25250761">
              <a id="link_25250761" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25250761,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender and Sexuality in Islam', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25250763">
              <a id="link_25250763" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25250763,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender and Sexuality in Islam', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25159508}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A free resource allowing searching within full text of books.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17580513">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17580513">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17580513">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Peer-reviewed journal articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17580513">
          <div id="boxatt17580513" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20670106">
              <a id="link_20670106" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20670106,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender and Sexuality in Islam', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20670110">
              <a id="link_20670110" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20670110,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender and Sexuality in Islam', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12465744}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for religious studies. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20670107">
              <a id="link_20670107" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20670107,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender and Sexuality in Islam', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25250758">
              <a id="link_25250758" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25250758,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender and Sexuality in Islam', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24818209}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A free resource. Use with caution, as not all resources are in fact scholarly.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17580514">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17580514">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17580514">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding out more about a journal
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17580514">
          <div id="boxatt17580514" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20694242">
              <a id="link_20694242" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20694242,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender and Sexuality in Islam', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12324431}); ">
               Ulrich's Web
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Ulrich's Directory is a database that provides bibliographic information, including if a journal is refereed or not (refereed is another word for peer-reviewed) on international periodicals.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21767596">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21767596">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21767596">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Popular resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21767596">
          <div id="boxatt21767596" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25250788">
              <a id="link_25250788" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25250788,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender and Sexuality in Islam', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016968}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4765639" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17580516">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17580516">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17580516">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in an bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17580516">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For help in writing annotated bibliographies, visit Purdue's
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           for a
           <a href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/01/">
            definition
           </a>
           of an annotation and
           <a href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
            sample formatting
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17580516" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17580517">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17580517">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17580517">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17580517">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17580517" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="footer">
     <div id="footer_topline">
